title: New 90210 font - NeutraFace
content:
I know this question has been asked dozens of times but does anybody no where i can get NeutraFace Display Thin or the set free? I visited this site months ago and a user and i donwloaded it free. Please can anybody give me this free, cuz im broke, i cant buy it for 243.  
Please, whoever user has it please i have a copy.

I will be using the fonts for very important college essays and on my videos for acceptance into Video Production schools. Please if you have it i really need it.
author: Ulrich22

comments.content: What will you be using the fonts for?
I will be using the fonts for very important college essays and on my videos for acceptance into Video Production schools. Please if you have it i really need it.

Nobody here will tell you where to get commercial fonts for free. Instead of worrying about fonts you can’t afford, look at the fonts you can. [Museo Sans can be purchased in individual weights for $16.50 or as inexpensive packages.](http://web.archive.org/web/20150205051212/http:/www.myfonts.com/PurchaseOptions?familyid=79195&id%5B%5D=159302)

Somebody here on this website has it, i downloaded it from here b4, and i cant order things online, cuz i live in the bahamas and have no credit card. Please if someone has it, can ihave a copy of NEutraface please.
Please

uuuhm....

No.

Alright, what the hell, I'll give it to you.

SIKE!

So, first you were broke, and now it’s the missing credit card.  
And: Last time I checked Florida was not part of the Bahamas (that’d carry the Swing State thing a little too far).

Go here:  
 [http://typophile.com/wiki/FAQ\_free](http://web.archive.org/web/20150205051212/http:/typophile.com/wiki/FAQ_free "http://typophile.com/wiki/FAQ\_free")

i strongly believe that a good designer can use whatever tools they have available to make great work. of course pro fonts are better than non-pro ones, but i've seen plenty of examples of work done with legal, free (or cheap)fonts, that is great.

if you can't afford to buy pro fonts, look for quality free type, or stretch yourself and see hoe you can make the bundled system fonts work for you.

also, i know this has been said before, but if you do get into video production, and start making videos, do you expect people to buy them from you? if yes, then why are you happy to not pay for fonts that are not free?

have you heard the saying 'what goes around, comes around'?

FWIW, the user profile links to a YouTube "homepage" ( [http://youtube.com/ulrich228](http://web.archive.org/web/20150205051212/http:/youtube.com/ulrich228 "http://youtube.com/ulrich228")) which in turn reveals (possibly falsely, possibly not) that Ulrich22, a.k.a. Camden Brooks (?), is a high school kid, purported "video production schools" notwithstanding. In any case, twerps ain't allowed to play with grownup typefaces — unless, of course, they can filch daddy's credit card or otherwise pony up requisite cash.

"Somebody here on this website has it," he says. Doubtless true enough, as a plain declarative, but they _paid for_ such wares (i.e., not warez). He further claims to have "downloaded it from here b4". Not a chance, lad. Not on a bet.

'Nuf said? No? Then go here: [http://typophile.com/wiki/FAQ\_free](http://web.archive.org/web/20150205051212/http:/typophile.com/wiki/FAQ_free "http://typophile.com/wiki/FAQ\_free")
Perhaps Ulrich22 is trying to communicate through his avatar to tell us that he eventually will join the good side.
I have a copy. What color do you need it in?
Black or any colour,post the link please.
Please
Where does Florida get mixed into this?

I live in the bahamas so i cant order those things and i have no credit card  
Please jupiterboy, i you have can i have a copy please.

Ulrich, this is called pirating. It is ILLEGAL to give out copies of licensed typefaces. When you license a typeface you license it for a certain use. Whether you live in the Bahamas, or Timbuktu, you should make the most of the tools you have. If your acceptance into school is dependent upon having a copy of Neutraface, then you have bigger problems than a lack of fonts. Find some freeware fonts to use instead. Good luck.

what's really funny is that he actually asked for this on Typophile, a place where people probably count pilcrows instead of sheep prior to going to sleep.  
speaking of sleep, i sure need some...  
i like pilcrows.

Maybe you should try these new, free, Dalton Maag fonts instead: [http://www.dmjx.dk/presserum/skrift.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20150205051212/http:/www.dmjx.dk/presserum/skrift.html "http://www.dmjx.dk/presserum/skrift.html")

Here's another good, FREE, typeface you can use:  
 [http://www.typophile.com/node/50437](http://web.archive.org/web/20150205051212/http:/www.typophile.com/node/50437 "http://www.typophile.com/node/50437")
Thanks for nothing

It's not (just) that you are asking for illegal copies of a font, it's that you're doing it here.

It's like walking into the police station to ask where you could score some pot.
Since he's paying nothing, it must mean the advice is priceless!

You are welcome. Your enthusiasm is admirable, however you did not ever get a pirated font from Typophile nor will you ever.

This thread reminds me of the junkie that ran up to the cop and complained that someone stole his dope.

Wow, I can't believe this thread has gone on this far. Ulrich, I do understand the love of a font, and the deep deep desire to own a copy that you could use...but there are rules and laws. Buy it, or find a version that you can afford. No one here will give it to you, and if they do, it's a shame.

Instead of asking for the font, ask people where you can find close versions for an affordable price, there are TONS of similar fonts for almost everyone worth owning. To an untrained eye, it will look practically identical. That is a question you will have answered with enthusiasm from this board.

courtney
im telling you, i got a copy from this website before when somebody asked the same question
I have a copy I can mail you. What is your home address & telephone number? (lulz)
Camden, no one is going to send you the fonts. they're not free. please stop asking. thanks.

Hey, does anyone have the H&FJ library i could have?

james

hehe, i couldn't resist.

oh hey itc\_james, I had a great idea, why don't I submit a résumé to H&FJ this week....but I don't own any of their fonts :-(

If you get all of the H&FJ library I'd love to borrow a few from you so I can use them in Word when I make my résumé, I think they'd really appreciate seeing their fonts used in professional software like Word and really impressed that I actually bothered to download their fonts!

\*sigh, rolls eyes\*
Ulrich must have downloaded the font before using his old account, since the current was registered just before he asked for it... ;-)
Yea i did
Commercial fonts are worth the money.
Most school essays &c. are set with Comic Sans. Try that, it's almost identical to Neutraface.

Well, looking at this from the other perspective, although it's not impossible, it's unlikely our friend Ulrich is using any sort of professional typesetting software for his essay anyway, so the majority of the advanced features in a pro font could never be used anyway.

If he's using a simple word processor like Word of OpenOffice he won't even have abilities like kerning or any sort of meaningful control over the type.

Ulrich22, yes, I agree with you that Neutraface looks nice, but for high school the teachers often require Times New Roman.

Before using any custom typeface at all, check with you teacher to see what they expect. For my english classes I had Font, Size, Spacing, Margins all required to be specific values. We didn't get marks off if it was wrong, in my school if it was wrong it didn't get marked. The end.

I'm gonna make a suggestion, don't tear me apart on this one. For me, when I look at Neutraface, it reminds me of the same feeling as Futura and Century Gothic. (especially the Capitals) Check to see if you have Futura or Century Gothic already, you often have one of the two pre-installed.

Best of luck,  
innovati!

"Yea i did"

OK, you win. Have a good day!

Tahoma = Neutraface (just kidding)

What irks me is that Ulrich is so pissed off... hey guy, maybe you DID download the font from here (which I seriously doubt), but it's not here any more. Get over it, and don't flame the folks that are telling you so. We all use fonts, and we actually BUY them.

I'm not made of money either, but I bought Neutraface (and Neutra2 when it was released) -- I haven't recouped my investment yet, but probably will eventually. But as a (occasional) type designer, I take issue with the idea of posting them for free. Yes, (unscrupulous) people do it, but NOT HERE.

Try limewire.

Did Hrant use a new Nomen to get all of us Typophiles excited?

I wonder.

. . .  
Bert Vanderveen BNO

It's the attitude more than the request that appalls me. Not everyone (especially a high school kid) knows about font piracy, he made what he thought was an innocent request. More educated minds on this forum told him his request was illegal and now he's pissed!

Ulrich, if you are still reading, you learned something here - that font sharing is illegal. Rather than get all nasty about it, use a free font for your school project (people were kind enough to send you some links) and try to save up some money to buy Neutraface down the road. It is a lovely font but NOBODY here is going to give it to you.

BTW anyone have a copy of Nobel they can send me? Jes kiddin'....

I want to thank Camden/Ulrich/BahamaBob and all the Typophiles for the most enjoyable read I've had all week.

This does sort of have an Papazianian feel to it. If this is Hrant, bravo!

this thread would never give me up, it would never let me down, it would never run around or desert me.

I hope a lesson has been learned here these past couple of days...
I am looking for a postscript version of this Neutra typeface--or a suggestion of something similar. Can anyone help?

_a place where people probably count pilcrows instead of sheep_

I thought we counted stolen sheep.
Hilarious.
He probably gave up and went with Century Gothic?

For what its worth, here's my take on font piracy.

[http://www.ideabook.com/tutorials/design\_business/the\_suicide\_of\_design....](http://web.archive.org/web/20150205051212/http:/www.ideabook.com/tutorials/design_business/the_suicide_of_design.html "http://www.ideabook.com/tutorials/design\_business/the\_suicide\_of\_design.html")

Ulrich is 14 or so...  
Were you never 14?

Umm this topic probably doesnt need to continue, cause today i attained the entire NeutraFace set, by doing some serious google searching.  
But you guys were helpful and taught me alot even tho its illegal, i just love the font, im sorry.  
No more font sharing after this for me, i got my NeutraFace wish.

There you go.  
Fire is out and a lot learnt...

Good luck Ulrich
